Invocation Name: market guru
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Market Guru suggests the best stocks to buy from the stocks exchange market by using pure technical analysis. 

Disclaimer: The stock price provided in this skill is for information purposes only, they do not represent an advise from the developer to transact at those prices and are intended solely for your use. Any indicative prices were created as of a specific time and market condition and do not represent the actual terms at which new transactions could be entered into. Also the developer of this skill does not guarantee the accuracy or completeness of any stock information, nor shall be liable to any person for delays, inaccuracies, omissions, or errors in such data, or for any actions taken in reliance on such data, or for any damages resulting therefrom.
